title: 97B.095 DISTURBING AND TAKING FROM BURROWS AND DENS.
text:
A person may not disturb the burrow or den of a wild animal between November 1 and April 1 without a permit.
A person may not remove a fox from a den or trap fox within 300 feet of a fox den from April 1 to August 31.
A person may not take a raccoon in a den or hollow tree.
